entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Kirkland Lake

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
